short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Quickly remove the download bar and wipe your browser download history for a specified period with one click.
short.de: Entfernen Sie die Download-Leiste schnell und löschen Sie den Download-Verlauf Ihres Browsers für einen bestimmten Zeitraum mit…
short.fr: Supprimez rapidement la barre de téléchargement et effacez l'historique des téléchargements de votre navigateur pour une période…
short.zh_CN: 快速删除下载栏，一键清除指定时间段内的浏览器下载历史。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
"Download History Cleaner" is a convenient method for erasing your browser's download history within a specified time frame. You have the flexibility to set a custom timeframe on the options page, as well as specify the area (zone) where you want to clear the data.

For a more thorough cleaning experience, consider using my eCleaner extension available at:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ecleaner-forget-button/ejhlpopncnfaaeicmbdnddebccnkfenn

With this extension, you can effectively wipe the download history from three distinct zones:
Regular websites,
Protected websites,
Extension zone
Definitions:
Extension zone: Includes extensions and packaged applications that a user has installed.
Protected websites zone: Encompasses websites that have been installed as hosted applications.

To report any bugs, please visit:
https://github.com/andy-portmen/ecleaner
long.de,fr,zh_CN:
Download History Cleaner is the easiest way to clear your browser download history for a specified period. You can define custom time on the options page. Also, you can define the area (zone) in which you want the data to be cleared.

For a more comprehensive cleaner try my eCleaner
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ecleaner-forget-button/ejhlpopncnfaaeicmbdnddebccnkfenn

Using this extension it is possible to wipe download history of three different zones:
1. Normal websites,
2. Protected websites,
3. Extension zone

Definitions:
  -> Extensions zone: Extensions and packaged applications a user has installed
  -> Protected websites zone: Websites that have been installed as hosted applications

For bug reports please visit:
https://github.com/andy-portmen/ecleaner

For FAQs please visit:
https://add0n.com/ecleaner.html?from=downloads-cleaner
